dcterms:creator: Gethin Norman
David Parker
Xueyi Zou
dcterms:description: This problem is a non-repudiation protocol for information transfer, introduced as a discrete-time POMDP model. The goal is to compute the maximum probability of a malicious behavior that a recipient is able to gain an unfair advantage by obtaining information from an originator while denying participating in the information transfer.
dcterms:title: Nrp8

dcterms:creator: Gethin Norman
David Parker
Xueyi Zou
dcterms:description: This problem models the dining cryptographers protocol as a POMDP. A group of cryptographers are having dinner at a restaurant, and the goal is to know if one of them is paying for the dinner anonymously.
dcterms:title: Crypt4

dcterms:creator: Maxime Bouton
Jana Tumova
Mykel J. Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: The rock sample problem models a rover exploring a planet, tasked with collecting rocks that can be either good or bad. The robot's sensing of rock states is noisy, and the problem ends when the robot reaches an exit area.
dcterms:title: Rocks12

dcterms:creator: Gethin Norman
David Parker
Xueyi Zou
dcterms:description: A classical POMDP problem where the goal is to reach a target state while avoiding an obstacle in a grid. The agent has a probability of staying still when attempting to move.
dcterms:title: Grid-av 4

dcterms:creator: Gethin Norman
David Parker
Xueyi Zou
dcterms:description: An extended version of the Grid-av problem with a larger grid and more obstacles, where the agent must navigate to a target state while avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Grid-av 10

dcterms:creator: Gethin Norman
David Parker
Xueyi Zou
dcterms:description: A further extension of the Grid-av problem with an even larger grid and more obstacles, where the agent must navigate to a target state while avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Grid-av 20

dcterms:creator: Alexander Bork
Sebastian Junges
Joost-Pieter Katoen
Tim Quatmann
dcterms:description: In this problem, the agent must reach a target state in a grid while avoiding a stochastically moving obstacle that is only visible within a limited radius.
dcterms:title: Drone 4-1

dcterms:creator: Alexander Bork
Sebastian Junges
Joost-Pieter Katoen
Tim Quatmann
dcterms:description: Similar to Drone 4-1, this problem involves the agent navigating to a target state while avoiding a stochastically moving obstacle.
dcterms:title: Drone 4-2

dcterms:creator: Alexander Bork
Sebastian Junges
Joost-Pieter Katoen
Tim Quatmann
dcterms:description: In this problem, the agent must reach a target state in a grid while managing energy consumption and avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Refuel6

dcterms:creator: Alexander Bork
Sebastian Junges
Joost-Pieter Katoen
Tim Quatmann
dcterms:description: An extension of the Refuel problem where the agent must navigate to a target state while managing energy consumption and avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Refuel8

dcterms:creator: Alexander Bork
Sebastian Junges
Joost-Pieter Katoen
Tim Quatmann
dcterms:description: A further extension of the Refuel problem where the agent must navigate to a target state while managing energy consumption and avoiding obstacles.
dcterms:title: Refuel20
